name: "Endi Ember Aku?"
description:
This game tells about the robot who searching its blue pail in a factory. 

The  obsacles in this game:

- Many non-stomping platforms

- Many blue pails that confusing robot for searching the real one

Controls:

Right : forward

Left: reverse

Single Up : Thrust

Double Up: Super Thrust

Git Lab Link: https://gitlab.com/GigantHouou/tutorials/tree/master/tutorial-5
